text: Update on COVID-19 Vaccine & Blood Donation: There is no wait to donate if you receive the Pfizer, Moderna, Johnson & Johnson/Janssen, Novovax or AstraZeneca COVID vaccine. For more information on coronavirus and blood donation, visit https://t.co/75QGA93w9K. #covid19 #vaccine https://t.co/TxPjBbZ3ig
